name: Spooky Scary Spaces
description:
In this game you take the role of a little girl who, with her water gun, enters a house where other children are constantly disappearing.

However, inside the house you notice that it does not follow a logical order, and each area seems to have no relation to the previous one. Still, you advance through the house, despite your fear, knowing that you are on the right path, as indicated by the presence of the Motogotchi (handheld game consoles) of the children who disappeared there before.

Developed by:

Alcaval - Programming & 3D Modelling

Dededec  - Programming & 3D Modelling

JaviBermanBD - Sound Design
